title: The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle: Volume Two (At the Fair / On Vacation / At Home / At Waikiki)
description: America's favorite country couple is back together again in The Adventures of Ma and Pa Kettle: Volume 2 featuring four of their most memorable films. Join Ma & Pa (Marjorie Main and Percy Kilbride) as they travel the globe getting involved in everything from international spies and pineapple plantations to harness racing and hurricanes! Featuring Ma and Pa Kettle at the Fair, Ma and Pa Kettle on Vacation, Ma and Pa Kettle at Home and Ma and Pa Kettle at Waikiki, this timeless collection includes good old-fashioned comedy at its finest.

Disc 1 - Ma and Pa Kettle on Vacation:
Disc 2 - Ma and Pa Kettle at Waikiki:
